Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.konovalov.implementor

Class ClassRepresentation

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.konovalov.implementor.ClassRepresentation
public class ClassRepresentation extends Object
Helper class used to generate and store class implementation.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ClassRepresentation

      public ClassRepresentation(Class<?> token) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Creates ClassRepresentation from provided class token. Generated header, all non-private constructors, and all non-private, non-static inherited methods, that return default values. Uses MethodRepresentation to generate all methods and constructors. Uses ClassHeader to generate header.
      Parameters:
      token - classToken that is used to represent the class/interface for which the implementation has to be implemented
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if all constructors are private
      UncheckedImplerException - if some functions that has to be implemented use some private Types, that are not visible

  • Method Details

    • addAllMethodsToCollection

      private static <T, U> Consumer<T[]> addAllMethodsToCollection(Function<T[],Stream<U>> transformer, Consumer<U> addder)
      Generic method to generate function that adds array of Method or Constructor to collection of signature classes AbstractMethodRepresentation
      Type Parameters:
      T - Method or Constructor
      U - MethodRepresentation or ConstructorRepresentation
      Parameters:
      transformer - function used to create Stream<AbstractMethodRepresentation> from provided array
      addder - function(almost always method reference) to add AbstractMethodRepresentation to some Collection
      Returns:
      function that can be used to add raw array of Methods/Ctors to collection

    • transformAll

      private static <T extends Executable> Stream<T> transformAll(T[] methods)
      Function used to produce Stream of methods/ctors that have to be implemented
      Type Parameters:
      T - Method or Constructor
      Parameters:
      methods - array of functions to implement
      Returns:
      Stream consisting of only implementable functions

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
